resources.string: First of all, make sure that you have logged in your google account. You can do it through settings page. This application allows you to combine your picture and a masterpiece of a famous painter. To do this go the Create Painting page and follows to easy step but make sure before that you have an internet connection on your device. When you are done with steps and your picture was sent, you will have to wait some time to receive the result. Do not panic - you can leave application at any time and you will be notified when the result is ready. To checkout your results go to the Gallery page (new images will be there only if you are connected).

This application was made by students from Saint-Petersburg Academic University: Anton Mordberg (Android + Server) and Semyon Polyakov (Machine Learning). If you have any questions feel free to contact us via github (https://github.com/AntonGitName/DeepShot).
